title: Insights on Low-Sugar Tiramisu Recipe
content:
I. Recipe Adjustments: 1. 250g mascarpone cheese; 2. 2 egg yolks, sugar reduced to 15g; 3. An appropriate amount of ladyfingers; 4. Strawberries for decoration.  
II. Key Production Points: 1. Whisk the egg yolks over a water bath until thickened; 2. The cheese must be softened at room temperature before mixing; 3. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours.  
III. Taste Evaluation: The sweetness is moderate, well-received by family members, and suitable for making at the next gathering.

title: Study Notes on 20th Century Fashion History
content:

II. Swinging London in the 1960s: 1. Popularity of the miniskirt; 2. Bright and bold colors.
III. Hippie and Punk in the 1970s: 1. Hippie style: Fringe and prints; 2. Punk style: Studs and distressed elements.

1. Preheat the pan evenly.  
2. Each crepe should be thin and uniform, cooked slowly over low heat.  

III. Failure Analysis:  
Yesterday, the crepes were too thick due to overly thick batter and uneven heat control.

title: Reflections on Making Tiramisu Cake
content:
I. Key Points for Ingredients:
1. Mascarpone cheese must be softened at room temperature.
2. Ladyfingers should be dipped quickly in coffee.

II. Crucial Steps:
1. Egg yolks must be pasteurized using a double boiler.
2. Whip the cream until soft peaks form.
3. Refrigerate for at least four hours to set.

III. Summary of Previous Failure:
Last time, the cheese was not softened properly, resulting in a grainy texture. Pay attention to this next time.
summarized_info:
Song Yajing documented her insights on making tiramisu cake. The content includes:
I. Key Ingredients:
1. Mascarpone cheese must be softened at room temperature.
2. Ladyfingers should be dipped quickly in coffee mixture.
II. Crucial Steps:
1. Egg yolks must be pasteurized using a double boiler.
2. Whipped cream should reach soft peaks.
3. Refrigerate for at least four hours to set.
III. Lessons from Failure:
Last time, the cheese was not softened properly, resulting in a grainy texture. Pay attention to this next time.

title: Key Points for Tiramisu Preparation
content:
I. Core Ingredients: 1. Mascarpone cheese; 2. Ladyfinger biscuits; 3. Espresso; 4. Cocoa powder.  
II. Key Steps: 1. Separate egg yolks and beat with sugar over a hot water bath; 2. Mix softened mascarpone cheese (at room temperature) with the egg yolk mixture; 3. Whip heavy cream separately until soft peaks form; 4. Combine the cheese mixture with the whipped cream; 5. Briefly dip ladyfinger biscuits into the espresso; 6. Layer biscuits and cheese mixture alternately in a mold; 7. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours; 8. Dust with cocoa powder before serving.  
III. Notes: Avoid overmixing the cheese, and ensure the espresso is cooled.
summarized_info:
Song Yajing's Notes on Key Points for Making Tiramisu

I. Core Ingredients:
1. Mascarpone cheese
2. Ladyfinger biscuits
3. Espresso
4. Cocoa powder

II. Key Steps:
1. Separate egg yolks and beat them with sugar over a hot water bath.
2. Mix the softened mascarpone cheese (at room temperature) with the egg yolk mixture.
3. Whip the heavy cream separately until soft peaks form.
4. Combine the cheese mixture with the whipped cream.
5. Quickly dip the ladyfinger biscuits into the espresso.
6. Layer the biscuits and cheese mixture alternately in the mold.
7. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours.
8. Sift cocoa powder over the top before serving.

III. Notes:
Do not overmix the cheese. The espresso must be cooled before use.

title: Baking and Dessert Study Notes
content:
I. Key Points for Vanilla Puff Recipe:
1. Puff Shell: Sift low-gluten flour, add flour immediately after butter and water come to a boil, and stir thoroughly.
2. Pastry Cream: Simmer heavy cream and vanilla bean over low heat; whisk egg yolks and sugar until fully aerated.

II. Common Reasons for Failure:
1. Puffs Not Rising: Insufficient oven temperature or opening the oven door too early.
2. Lumpy Filling: Overly rapid heating or lack of continuous stirring.

III. Inspiration Source: Experiment with new recipes over the weekend, pairing them with fruit tea for a family afternoon tea.

I. Basic Silhouettes: 1. A-line (narrow at the top and wide at the bottom, elegant and slimming); 2. H-line (straight-cut, sharp and neutral).  
II. Suitable Body Types: 1. A-line suits pear-shaped figures, helping to conceal the hips; 2. H-line suits apple-shaped figures, helping to blur the waistline.  
III. Corresponding In-Store Products: 1. Woolen skirts are mostly A-line; 2. Slow-selling thick coats are mostly H-line, and pairing them with A-line innerwear is recommended for sales.

title: Key Points for Fabric Knowledge Review
content: I. Natural Fibers: 1. Cotton: Moisture-absorbent and breathable, prone to wrinkling, requires moisture protection; 2. Wool: Warm, prone to shrinkage, requires dry cleaning; 3. Silk: Good luster, delicate, requires hand washing. II. Chemical Fibers: 1. Polyester: Wear-resistant and wrinkle-resistant, poor breathability; 2. Nylon: Good elasticity, superior wear resistance compared to polyester; 3. Viscose: Feels like cotton, low wet strength. III. Common Confusion: Difference in wear resistance between polyester and nylon (nylon is superior).
summarized_info:
Song Yajing recorded key points for reviewing fabric knowledge, including:

I. Natural Fibers:
1. Cotton: Moisture-absorbent and breathable, prone to wrinkling, requires moisture prevention.
2. Wool: Warm, prone to shrinkage, requires dry cleaning.
3. Silk: Lustrous, delicate, requires hand washing.

II. Chemical Fibers:
1. Polyester: Wear-resistant and wrinkle-resistant, poor breathability.
2. Nylon: Good elasticity, superior wear resistance compared to polyester.
3. Viscose: Feels like cotton, low wet strength.

III. Points of Confusion: Difference in wear resistance between polyester and nylon (nylon is superior).

title: Annual Financial Review - Fourth Quarter Decline Analysis
content: Sales in the fourth quarter of 2024 decreased by approximately 15% compared to the third quarter. Preliminary analysis identifies the following reasons: 1. Weather factors: Frequent rainy weather in Q4 led to reduced foot traffic on the pedestrian street. 2. Competitive impact: A new store with a similar style opened at the end of the street, diverting some younger customers. 3. Insufficient promotions: During the Double Eleven period, online promotions and in-store discount activities were inadequate and failed to effectively attract customers. Follow-up plans for Q4 2025 need to address these points.
summarized_info: In her notes, Song Yajing detailed three main reasons for the decline in fourth-quarter revenue: weather impact, competition from new stores, and insufficient online promotions.

Therefore, I prepared sandbags and thickened waterproof plastic sheets in advance, hoping they will provide effective protection.

title: February 16th: Reflections on West Street
content: In the morning, I walked home with my parents from West Street. As we climbed the steps up the small slope on Xinhua North Road, I watched my father ascend step by step, much slower than I remembered, his figure swaying slightly. My heart suddenly tightened. The flavors of the traditional tea snacks I’ve enjoyed since childhood haven’t changed, but the marks left by time on them became so clear in that moment. I can take this nostalgic taste of Quanzhou back with me, but are the best years of my parents quietly slipping away? I need to think about this carefully.
summarized_info: I noted in my journal that while walking home with my parents from West Street this morning, I observed my father ascending the steps with slow, slightly unsteady movements. This sight deeply moved me, as it clearly revealed the passage of time etched upon my parents.

title: Post-Examination Reflection
content: Today, I completed an important health check-up. The process went smoothly, but the waiting period for the results made me reflect deeply. Health is the foundation, but life is more than just that. Over the past few years, I have been preoccupied with the trivialities of daily life, and my drive in my career seems to have waned somewhat. My small clothing store needs a fresh infusion of vitality, and I also require more systematic professional knowledge to support it. It’s time to put my learning plan on the agenda, such as delving deeper into the history of clothing, which I’ve always wanted to do. Starting with foundational courses like "A Brief History of Western Clothing Development" would be a good idea. Health must be managed, and my career must also be given a boost.

title: Minutes of Store Order Review Meeting on November 17
content:
In the morning, reviewed the small program order packing process with Xiaomei.
【Issues Identified】
1. The overall packing stage takes the longest time and is currently the main bottleneck.
2. The filler materials (bubble wrap/paper) are of irregular sizes, requiring multiple cuts and folds.
3. Low efficiency in finding the starting point for tape application and tearing it off.
【Optimization Directions】
- Purchase uniformly sized filler bags to reduce cutting.
- Investigate courier bags with self-adhesive backing to eliminate the separate step of taping.
- Design customized sealing stickers (including store logo and information) to improve efficiency and brand perception.
- Reorganize the division of labor process and clarify responsibilities for picking, checking, packing, and labeling.
In the afternoon, proceed with material procurement and arrange a process rehearsal test.
summarized_info: In her notes, Song Yajing documented the review of the order packaging process with Xiaomei, identifying the packaging stage as the primary bottleneck. Optimization directions, including procuring new materials and reallocating tasks, were proposed.

title: Project Completion Records and Follow-up Learning Plan
content: I finally submitted the midterm PPT for the online marketing course, titled "[Elegant Moments] Boutique Summer Visual Merchandising Upgrade Plan," this morning. After completing the submission, I took advantage of the relatively quiet morning at the store to systematically study the history of 20th-century fashion. I focused on the industrialization of ready-to-wear clothing after World War II, the "Swinging London" style of the 1960s, and the hippie and punk styles of the 1970s. After studying, I felt inspired and plan to compile these insights into a "Mid-20th Century Style Inspiration Library" PPT, which can serve as a reference for future store product selection and styling.
summarized_info: Song Yajing noted that she submitted the midterm PPT for the online marketing course in the morning, and subsequently conducted a systematic study of 20th-century fashion history (focusing on post-World War II ready-to-wear industrialization, Swinging London in the 1960s, and hippie and punk styles in the 1970s). She plans to compile this into a PPT titled "Mid-20th Century Style Inspiration Library."

title: Baking Experiment: Low-Sugar Fruit Tea Cake (Initial Trial)
content: Attempt on the evening of August 1st. Prepared strictly according to the memorized recipe, incorporating self-brewed fruit tea concentrate. The batter expanded well during baking but collapsed severely after removal from the oven. The center was moist, but the overall texture was overly dense and compact, with sweetness noticeably lower than expected. Preliminary analysis: 1. The fruit tea liquid is acidic, which may have neutralized some of the baking powder, resulting in insufficient expansion and poor structural support; 2. The total proportion of liquid (tea liquid + others) in the batter may have been too high, or the flour's water absorption rate may have been miscalculated. Recorded for future adjustments.
summarized_info: Song Yajing documented a failed attempt at making a low-sugar fruit tea cake, describing issues such as collapse, dense texture, and low sweetness. She also analyzed possible causes, including the acidity of the fruit tea infusion and the liquid ratio.

title: Baking Journal: The Success of Fusion Innovation
content: On the evening of August 9th, the second attempt. I shifted my approach, moving away from the traditional cake base and trying to incorporate the flavor of peach oolong tea into tiramisu. The process went very smoothly, with each step perfectly executed, and I felt joyful while making it. The final product received unanimous praise from my family! The flavors blended well, with the tea aroma balancing the richness of the cheese, and the sweetness was just right. Compared to the collapsed cake from earlier this month, this adjustment in direction was correct.
summarized_info: Song Yajing documented the process of her second attempt at making a low-sugar fruit tea fusion cake (tiramisu), describing the procedure as smooth and expressing a pleasant mood. She indicated that the attempt was successful, contrasting it with her previous attempts.

title: Course Learning and Window Display Renovation Concept

During the dinner, my husband, parents, and younger sister all praised them highly, especially my husband, who said they were even better than the version I brought to the charity sale last time, with a more delicate texture. My younger sister even joked that I could start a private dessert business. Receiving such affirmation from my family truly made me happy, and I owe it to the encouragement from everyone at the charity sale, which gave me the confidence to continue experimenting and improving.
summarized_info: Song Yajing documented the weekend family gathering, during which her homemade macarons received unanimous praise from her family. She attributed this success to the encouragement and confidence she gained from the previous charity sale event.

title: New Product Concept: Peach Oolong Chiffon
content: Yesterday (May 25th), the fruit tea flavor concept was executed as scheduled. I brewed the peach oolong tea sent by Mrs. Liu, which had a distinctive aroma. I conceptualized a chiffon cake that incorporates the tea infusion and dried fruit into the batter. The ratio is as follows: 85g of low-gluten flour, 60g of tea infusion, a small amount of peach pulp, and 5 egg whites. The core idea is to highlight the tea's delicate elegance and the peach's subtle sweetness. I need to refer to some classic recipes for guidance.
summarized_info: This document records the ideation process and preliminary formulation for incorporating fruit tea flavors into cakes, conducted on May 25, 2025.

title: Practice Record of Relaxation Methods
content:
August 22: Soaked feet in hot water for 20 minutes in the evening, with slightly hot water temperature, resulting in mild sweating. Combined with 5 minutes of abdominal breathing exercises. Felt relief from head tension and found it easier to become drowsy compared to simply lying down. Recorded that this method works well and can be continued consistently.
(Previous record: August 17-20, soaked feet for about 15 minutes daily, with slight improvement in sleep quality and reduced time to fall asleep.)
summarized_info: This entry documents the relaxation experience of combining foot soaking with breathing exercises on August 22, confirms its sleep-promoting effects, and mentions the consistent practice over the previous days.

title: Shopping Decision Reference and Planning
content: September 14th: Reviewed records since August on foot soaking for sleep aid, finding the practice consistently effective and beneficial. To make it easier and more comfortable to maintain this habit, I decided to upgrade my equipment. Goal: Purchase an electric foot soaking tub with massage and constant temperature functions. Requirements: Safe, easy to clean, and capable of covering the calves. Several options have been preliminarily selected, with a focus on user reviews regarding health and sleep improvement. Reason for purchase: To consolidate and enhance a proven effective sleep aid routine.
summarized_info: On September 14th, based on a review of the foot-soaking practice records from August and their positive effects, a consumption decision was made to purchase an electric foot-soaking bucket to reinforce the habit.

title: A Brief Account of the Gathering
content: August 12th was Meiling's birthday. Everyone had a great time. The snacks I brought seemed to be the highlight of the party. Both Meiling and Xiaohong said they were deeply touched, remarking that it was remarkable for me to put so much thought into preparing them. As we chatted, they learned about my recent work difficulties and came to comfort me, encouraging me not to put too much pressure on myself. They said that with my sincerity and abilities, I could overcome any challenge. My heart felt truly warmed.

title: Store Risk Self-Assessment
content: This afternoon, I reviewed the potential risks for the store: 1. Serious diversion of customers to online channels; 2. Lack of knowledge in new media operations; 3. Slow inventory turnover. Immediate action is required, and systematic learning of online operations is necessary.

title: Preliminary Considerations Regarding Parents' Relocation
content: After dinner, I proposed the idea of having my parents move to Xiamen. The preliminary consideration is to rent an apartment for them in the same residential community. This way, everyone can have their own space while making it convenient to provide care. Further research on housing availability and financial feasibility is required.
summarized_info: Song Yajing documented preliminary considerations regarding her parents' relocation, mentioning the option of renting an apartment in the same residential complex. The reasons were vaguely stated as maintaining individual space and facilitating care.

title: Review of Yesterday's Family Meeting
content: Last night, I presented the relocation report to my parents. They showed no resistance to the "renting within the same community" plan, and my mother even mentioned the convenience of medical visits. It seems our initial considerations were correct: maintaining the independence of our parents' lives and reducing daily friction between the two generations. Living separately but staying close is the best balance.
summarized_info: Song Yajing reviewed yesterday's family meeting, clearly stating that the initial decision to rent an apartment in the same residential complex was to maintain her parents' independence and reduce friction.

title: Reflections on Piano Lessons (After the First Lesson)
content:
August 16, 2025. First official lesson. The teacher first had me play scales and noticed that my wrists were a bit tense and not relaxed enough. The main focus was teaching the first half of "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star," and I was instructed to practice slowly at home every day, emphasizing that my wrists should follow the movement of my fingers and avoid stiffness. The teacher seemed strict but explained things very clearly. I hope to make progress by next week.
(Note: Paid a single lesson fee of 200 yuan.)
summarized_info: Song Yajing documented the learning content and after-class practice requirements of the first piano lesson, and mentioned the payment of fees.
